verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> Are <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G3779>so?<s%>

And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G435>Men,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G191>listen;<s%> The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> when he was in <S%G3318>Mesopotamia,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G2228><s%> he <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in <S%G5488>Charran,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1831>Get<s%> you out of your <S%G1093>country,<s%> and from your <S%G4772>kindred,<s%> and <S%G1204>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I shall <S%G1166>show<s%> you.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> he out of the <S%G1093>land<s%> of the <S%G5466>Chaldaeans,<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in <S%G5488>Charran:<s%> and from <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G3326>when<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> was <S%G599>dead,<s%> he <S%G3351>removed<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G1519>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> you <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2730>dwell.<s%>

And he <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in it, no, not so much as to <S%G968>set<s%> his <S%G4228>foot<s%> on: <S%G2532>yet<s%> he <S%G1861>promised<s%> that he would <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him for a <S%G2697>possession,<s%> and to his <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> him, when as yet he <S%G5607>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5043>child.<s%>

And <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> on <S%G3779>this<s%> wise, That his <S%G4690>seed<s%> should <S%G1510>sojourn<s%> <S%G3941><s%> in a <S%G245>strange<s%> <S%G1093>land;<s%> and that they should <S%G1402>bring<s%> them into <S%G1402>bondage,<s%> and <S%G2559>entreat<s%> them <S%G2559>evil<s%> <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

And the <S%G1484>nation<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> they shall be in <S%G1398>bondage<s%> will I <S%G2919>judge,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> that shall they <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G3000>serve<s%> me in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

And he <S%G1325>gave<s%> him the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision:<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> Abraham <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> him the <S%G3590>eighth<s%> <S%G2250>day;<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> begat <S%G2384>Jacob;<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> begat the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3966>patriarchs.<s%>
And the <S%G3966>patriarchs,<s%> <S%G2206>moved<s%> with <S%G2206>envy,<s%> <S%G591>sold<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt:<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> was with him,

And <S%G1807>delivered<s%> him out of <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G2347>afflictions,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G5485>favor<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> in the <S%G1726>sight<s%> of <S%G5328>Pharaoh<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt;<s%> and he <S%G2525>made<s%> him <S%G2233>governor<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and <S%G3650>all<s%> his <S%G3624>house.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3042>dearth<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and <S%G5477>Chanaan,<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>affliction:<s%> and our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5527>sustenance.<s%>
But when <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that there was <S%G4621>corn<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> he <S%G1821>sent<s%> out our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G4412>first.<s%>

And <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> time <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> was <S%G319>made<s%> <S%G319>known<s%> to his <S%G80>brothers;<s%> and <S%G2501>Joseph's<s%> <S%G1085>kindred<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>known<s%> to <S%G5328>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> and <S%G3333>called<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> to him, and <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4772>kindred,<s%> three <S%G1440>score<s%> and <S%G1440>fifteen<s%> <S%G4002><s%> <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and <S%G5053>died,<s%> he, and our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

And were <S%G3346>carried<s%> <S%G3346>over<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4966>Sychem,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> in the <S%G3418>sepulcher<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G5608>bought<s%> for a <S%G5092>sum<s%> of <S%G694>money<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1697>Emmor<s%> the father of <S%G4966>Sychem.<s%>

But <S%G2531>when<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> drew <S%G1448>near,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G3660>sworn<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G837>grew<s%> and <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>
<S%G891>Till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> not <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2686>dealt<s%> <S%G2686>subtly<s%> with our <S%G1085>kindred,<s%> and <S%G2559>evil<s%> <S%G2559>entreated<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> so that they <S%G4160>cast<s%> <S%G1570><s%> out their <S%G1025>young<s%> <S%G1025>children,<s%> to the <S%G1519>end<s%> they might not <S%G2225>live.<s%>

In <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G1080>born,<s%> and was <S%G3588>exceeding<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G791>fair,<s%> and <S%G397>nourished<s%> up in his <S%G3962>father's<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months:<s%>
And when he was <S%G1620>cast<s%> out, <S%G5328>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> <S%G337>took<s%> him up, and <S%G397>nourished<s%> him for her <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%>
And <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G3811>learned<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G124>Egyptians,<s%> and was <S%G1415>mighty<s%> in <S%G3056>words<s%> and in <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> he was <S%G4137>full<s%> <S%G5063>forty<s%> <S%G5063>years<s%> <S%G5550>old,<s%> it <S%G305>came<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> his <S%G2588>heart<s%> to <S%G1980>visit<s%> his <S%G80>brothers<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

And <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of them suffer <S%G91>wrong,<s%> he <S%G292>defended<s%> him, and <S%G4160>avenged<s%> <S%G1557><s%> him that was <S%G2669>oppressed,<s%> and <S%G3960>smote<s%> the <S%G124>Egyptian:<s%>

For he <S%G3543>supposed<s%> his <S%G80>brothers<s%> would have <S%G4920>understood<s%> how that <S%G2316>God<s%> by his <S%G5495>hand<s%> would <S%G1325>deliver<s%> them: but they <S%G4920>understood<s%> not.

And the <S%G1966>next<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he <S%G3700>showed<s%> himself to them as they <S%G3164>strove,<s%> and would have <S%G4900>set<s%> them <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G1515>one<s%> <S%G1515>again,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G435>Sirs,<s%> you are <S%G80>brothers;<s%> <S%G2444>why<s%> <S%G91>do<s%> you <S%G91>wrong<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another?<s%>

But he that <S%G91>did<s%> his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G91>wrong<s%> <S%G683>thrust<s%> him <S%G683>away,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2525>made<s%> you a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and a <S%G1348>judge<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> us?
<S%G2309>Will<s%> you <S%G337>kill<s%> me, as you <S%G337>did<s%> the <S%G124>Egyptian<s%> <S%G5504>yesterday?<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> and was a <S%G3941>stranger<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3099>Madian,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons.<s%>

And when <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G4137>expired,<s%> there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to him in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> of <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sina<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> in a <S%G942>bush.<s%>

When <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, he <S%G2296>wondered<s%> at the <S%G3705>sight:<s%> and as he <S%G4334>drew<s%> <S%G4334>near<s%> to <S%G2657>behold<s%> it, the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to him,

Saying, I am the <S%G2316>God<s%> of your <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%> <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1096>trembled,<s%> <S%G1790><s%> and <S%G5111>dared<s%> not <S%G2657>behold.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to him, <S%G3089>Put<s%> <S%G3089>off<s%> your <S%G5266>shoes<s%> from your <S%G4228>feet:<s%> for the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G2476>stand<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

I have <S%G1492>seen,<s%> I have <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G2561>affliction<s%> of my <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and I have <S%G191>heard<s%> their <S%G4726>groaning,<s%> and am <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G1807>deliver<s%> them. And <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1204>come,<s%> I will <S%G649>send<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt.<s%>

<S%G5126>This<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G720>refused,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2525>made<s%> you a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and a <S%G1348>judge?<s%> the <S%G5126>same<s%> did <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> to be a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and a <S%G3086>deliverer<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to him in the <S%G942>bush.<s%>

He <S%G1806>brought<s%> them out, after that he had <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> and <S%G4592>signs<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and in the <S%G2281>Red<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is that <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet<s%> shall the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G450>raise<s%> up to you of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> to me; him shall you <S%G191>hear.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is he, that was in the <S%G1577>church<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> with the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to him in the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sina,<s%> and with our <S%G3962>fathers:<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G2198>lively<s%> <S%G3051>oracles<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> to us:

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G5255>obey,<s%> <S%G1036><s%> but <S%G683>thrust<s%> him from them, and in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%> <S%G4762>back<s%> <S%G4762>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>

<S%G2036>Saying<s%> to <S%G2>Aaron,<s%> <S%G4160>Make<s%> us <S%G2316>gods<s%> to <S%G4313>go<s%> <S%G4313>before<s%> us: for as for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1806>brought<s%> us out of the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G1096>become<s%> of him.

And they <S%G3447>made<s%> a <S%G3447>calf<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G321>offered<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%G1497>idol,<s%> and <S%G2165>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%G2041>works<s%> of their own <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G3860>gave<s%> them up to <S%G3000>worship<s%> the <S%G4756>host<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> O you <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> have you <S%G4374>offered<s%> to me <S%G4968>slain<s%> <S%G4968>beasts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> by the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness?<s%>

<S%G2532>Yes,<s%> you <S%G353>took<s%> up the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G3434>Moloch,<s%> and the <S%G798>star<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2316>god<s%> <S%G4481>Remphan,<s%> <S%G5179>figures<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4160>made<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> them: and I will <S%G3351>carry<s%> you <S%G3351>away<s%> <S%G1900>beyond<s%> <S%G897>Babylon.<s%>

Our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1510>had<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G3142>witness<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> as he had <S%G1299>appointed,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> that he should <S%G4160>make<s%> it <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5179>fashion<s%> that he had <S%G3708>seen.<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> that <S%G1237>came<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1521>brought<s%> in with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2697>possession<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1856>drove<s%> out <S%G575>before<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> to the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G1138>David;<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5485>favor<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G154>desired<s%> to <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4638>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>
But <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> him an <S%G3624>house.<s%>
<S%G235>However,<s%> the <S%G5310>most<s%> <S%G5310>High<s%> <S%G2730>dwells<s%> not in <S%G3485>temples<s%> <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands;<s%> as <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%>
